path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Basic Nursing Skills/Documents/Module 1 Objectives (VS-PA) 2023.pdf
text: TEMPLECOLLEGE VOCATIONAL NURSING PROGRAM BASIC NURSING SKILLS: VNSG 1423 MODULE I â€“ VITAL SIGNS & ASSESSMENT Chapters 21 & 22- Williams After completing Module I, the student will be able to: 1. Demonstrate measuring and recording vital signs. 2. Describe the significance of normal and abnormal vital signs. 3. Differentiate between comprehensive health assessment, a focused assessment and an initial head-to-toe shift assessment. 4. Perform a head-to-toe assessment identifying the significance of abnormal assessment findings. 5. Describe adaptations in assessment techniques that are necessary due to the age of the client. Rev/5/22/ax
